titles: A declaration from the people called Quakers, to the present distracted nation of England with mourning and lamentation over it, because of its breaches ...
author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"The substance of this was given forth ... through E. Burrough ... " signed by fifteen other Friends.
Attributed to Edward Burrough. cf. BM.
